name: Black Rose (itch) (Doublevhe)
description:
You're a gardener. Your goal is to protect the flower in the middle of the garden, to do that move with Q and D, press F to turn on or off your flashlight so little creatures named "shades" can appear. Click on them before there are too many of them. But be carefull ! When activated, your flashlight's battery quickly drain, turn it off and hold E to recharge it.

This is my first game so don't expect much of it, I still hope you guys will enjoy :)

Oh and there is no pause menu/music and I'm well aware of a bug which make ennemies impossible to click on when they are at the far right or left of the flashlight, I do not have the skills required in order to fix it, sorry ! (And if you play it on browser, the quit button won't do anything, don't click it)
